pageProduct.name: Thompson's Garlic Perles 180 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Garlic Perles Traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to help relieve common cold symptoms.

Thompson's Garlic Perles contains a high concentration of garlic oil which has been used traditionally in Western herbal medicine to:
- Relieve symptoms of common cold & flu including cough, runny nose, sneezing and feelings of weakness
- Relieve symptoms of mild upper respiratory tract infections
- Reduce mild upper respiratory tract congestion and clear excess mucus
- Support general health & wellbeing
Not to be used in children under 2 years of age

Size: 180caps

KEY FEATURES

• Relieve symptoms of mild upper respiratory tract infections
• Used traditional Western herbal medicine to help relieve common cold symptoms, congestion and mild upper respiratory tract infections.
• Odour controlled when taken with a cold drink.
• Support general health & wellbeing
• Relieve symptoms of common cold & flu including cough, runny nose, sneezing and feelings of weakness
• Vegetarian friendly.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice. Contains Sulfites and peppermint oil.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each capsules contains:
Allium sativum (Garlic) oil 1mg
equiv. to fresh bulb 3g (3000mg)

Contains: Sulfites, soya beans and peppermint oil.

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
